data.actual_result: You see the message appearing with a small animation for a very short time.
data.expected_result: The message is there and it doesn't have any animation.
data.short_description: The connection problems pop-up has an animation every time you switch app and open Discord.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get the connection problems pop-up. (Switching to 2G only on your phone settings and restarting Discord should trigger it). - Switch to another app (also just going to the home page works) and open Discord. - Observe.
